7.short_description: Addis Pharmaceutical Factory manufactures high-quality pharmaceutical products such as antibiotics, cardiovascular drugs and much more.

24.description:
Addis Pharmaceutical Factory manufactures high-quality pharmaceutical products such as antibiotics, cardiovascular drugs and much more.

Addis Pharmaceutical Factory (APF) PLC is the largest pharmaceutical manufacturing company headquartered at Adigrat, Tigray regional State of Ethiopia,  898 km away from Addis. The town is 2300 meters above sea level. The plant was constructed and equipped with high tech production facilities.

The company has been manufacturing more than 91 high quality pharmaceutical products of different therapeutic categories including Antibiotics, Gastro-intestinal drugs, Central Nervous system drugs, Cardiovascular drugs, anti diabetic agents, Antihistamines & Anti allergic, Antihelminthics, analgesics, Antiprotozoals,Respiratory drugs, dermatologicalsand Minerals & Vitamins and Large volume Parenterals; in various dosage forms.
The company has more than nine production lines and fully equipped laboratories as well as utilities capable of producing tablets, capsules, syrups/suspensions, dry powders for reconstitution, injectable vials, liquid injectable ampoules, creams and ointments which can generally be categorized as Non-Lactam products (Tablets, Capsules (General), Syrups/Suspensions, Ampoules (Sterile), Topical Ointments, Creams and Gels) and Lactam products (Vials (Sterile), Capsules and dry powders for reconstitution). The Lactam products are manufactured in dedicated lines, whereas other non-Lactam products are manufactured on a campaign basis in other manufacturing lines.
In 2009, the company acquired a second plant located at Akaki/ Kality sub city, Addis Ababa which is dedicated for the manufacturing of large volume Parenterals.
The company’s manufacturing processes are designed, directed, regularly monitored and controlled in line with cGMP recommendations, the company’s Quality Manual and directions of local Regulatory Authority. The company has managed to get a GMP certification from the local regulatory authority; Food, medicines and healthcare administration and control authority of Ethiopia, through a Certificate of Competence for Drug Manufacturing Plant.

27.category_groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering

5.categories: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Retail, Retail Technology

7.short_description: Intuitivo is a technology AI/Computer vision company.

24.description:
Intuitivo is a technology AI/Computer vision company that's building the perfect one-on-one shopping experience for the future of retail: agile, smarter, fully automated, with no cash or lines. Just Grab & Go.
 
The company is retrofitting shelves of coolers, transforming them into autonomous points of purchase (A-POPs). The cameras placed in the frames capture the videos and our computer vision pipelines help us understand what is going on in the transaction.

The customers scan a QR code on the A-POP, open it, grab what they want and leave. The technology works with any digital wallet, so the payment is instant and contactless.


Intuitivo was founded in 2019 by Tomás Manzitti, COO; Nicolás Parziale, CEO; and Jose Benítez Genes, CIO. With over 250 Grab&Go’s installed, the tech company has the highest autonomous point of sales rollout with a pure AI/Computer Vision play in the industry.

7.short_description: Colektia is a digital platform that helps financial institutions create new digital collections models, based on artificial intelligence.

24.description:
Colektia is a digital platform that helps financial institutions create new digital collections models, based on artificial intelligence. They predict the best communication strategy for companies to contact debtors (best channel / best time / best day) and use robots to do so.  The platform generates portals so that users can generate their payments, refinance and schedule payment promises.

Colektia uses predictive models throughout the management process in key stages such as segmentation, validation, and management of management channels. Their artificial intelligence processes allow them to develop the best strategy to achieve greater effectiveness and efficiency in the collection. They integrate new channels such as WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, etc., Expanding the management capacity and improving the contact ability.

Colektia was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile.
